website_summaries.verdict: The best budget spark screen due to its small size, but it has heavy-duty, quality construction.
pros: Offers the same level of durability and protection as larger screens but in about half the size
Ring on top provides a safe way to lift the spark screen
At a little over 3 pounds, it's easy to handle
cons: Small size limits the number of compatible fire pits

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking screen
customer_reviews.text: This screen was not cheap and the fact that it doesn’t work makes it useless. Do not buy. Update. We used last night, and ashes still got all over my outside furniture. Not sure what to try next. Haven’t used it yet but looks nice. Just have to figure out if will need to anchor down or not. It’s not very heavy but not super light either.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M.

customer_reviews.title: Beware of holes in your spark screen if you use it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the screen cover ~1-week, and I have built 4 fires using it. Already, the screen is completely warped and the metal has already starting breaking apart. Doesn't do much good to shave a spark cover if it has holes in it to allow the embers to fly away. Very cheaply made; nice to look at but not worth the money if you actually plan on using your fire pit. FYI--the screen cover before this one lasted me 2 years on the same fire pit!
customer_reviews.author: Grady Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: The spark screen arrived in perfect condition. It amazingly was a perfect fit for our very old fire pit which we refurbished with new granite and fresh paint. We've used it several times and so far it's holding up nicely. I can't speak to longevity but we've not had any rust or distortion from heat so far. We do keep our pit covered when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: shelovespickups

customer_reviews.title: Cover those flying ashes
customer_reviews.text: I think this item was kind of pricey. I bought it because we needed it. Had lots of ashes flying into out drinks. It does the job, don't get me wrong, there still stuff that comes through the holes still but def not anywhere near when the fire place was uncovered. Keep in mind when you take off the screen the top part is hot so don't touch it w/your bare hands. It does the job. I did post a picture of also of the screen not laying flat, it pops up a bit on the corner, not sure if that is normal. Anyways this is why I cannot give this item 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Lety

customer_reviews.title: Warped after a couple uses
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like a quality product and served the purpose for a couple fires but after two uses the top started melting down and it is now warped. It still works currently, but I foresee it breaking after a few more uses. I expected more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jill D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for the square fire pit.
customer_reviews.text: After moving into our new home we didn’t realize we couldn’t burn vines in the fire pit and the fire department showed up. Oops. They were kind and just told us to make sure we get a grate for it just to be safe so I ordered one and it is the perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: TIFPONY

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical odor during use!
customer_reviews.text: There was a strong chemical odor during use that made us all nauseous. It makes me nervous about using it and cooking near it. Lastly, the black coating bubbled slightly during the first use. Save your money, not worth risking your health.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for our new backyard firepit
customer_reviews.text: We are being very cautious about using firepit during these dry times - and this screen helps keep the embers from popping/floating out of fire onto nearby grass. Works as it should - and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Belden

customer_reviews.title: came incomplete
customer_reviews.text: this product came without the handle, so i can't actually use it. I contacted the manufacturer, and they said they'd send me the handle. that's been over a month, and still nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Buffy Dixson

customer_reviews.title: At least it works I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Just like others have stated on here this screen will not continue to look like it does out of the box. First fire I had all four sections of screen warped and all of the paint peeled off. It does still keep the embers from shooting out of the fire so that is why it gets 2 stars. Not sure there is a good option in this size, I haven’t found one. Guess I will just have to settle on a rusty fire screen and no house fires
customer_reviews.author: Poco

customer_reviews.title: Nice Way To Cover Your Fire
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and seems very sturdy. This was a great purchase and I’d recommend this to any young buck who wants to cover their fire.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works but it is about as chinsy as it gets. It can barely withstand the heat of the flames, should be listed around $30 not over $100. But if you don't mind is being warped and weird looking after the first hour, it does do its job
customer_reviews.author: David w

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice,  but does not fit well at all.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of flimsy. Does NOT fit the pit its designed for. Need to be about an inch larger as it falls inside the 36" or its designed for.
customer_reviews.author: smbk25

customer_reviews.title: It works very well
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and strength; sits nicely on fire pit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty but can;t take the heat from the fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item without the intent of leaving it on the fire place when in use but my son left it on the fire place while it was on an the color came off and the cover started to warp. So please be sure not leave it on the firepit when it is on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, works well but rusted almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: If I had known it would rust this fast (literally in 3 days) I would not have gotten it but the company made good and handled it very well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wargo

customer_reviews.title: It fits our square fire pit that my Grandson and I built.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great on my fire pit! Because of the weather being very windy we have not been able to use it, but it should work perfectly! It feels a little light but it hasn't blown off because of the wind!
customer_reviews.author: RFarley

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dented when I took it out of the box. Not happy about it. I sprayed it with rust oleum because of the reports of it rusting shortly after use. Don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully constructed fire pit screen which fitted my fire pit ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully constructed fire pit screen which fitted my fire pit perfectly. Amazon did I again as they were the only who offered screen only without having to buy the whole fire pit. Saved myself at least $150.00!!
customer_reviews.author: FREDDIE J.

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: This product is not 31 inches. It is barely ,24 inches. Hardly covers our fire pit and is bowing already from heat of flames. Very disappointed for price. Much smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Janine M. Capasso

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Melted at Forst fire and broke apart, plus rusted in first week
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: This one is just like the flimsy one that came with my fire dish ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could have found a square screen in heavy gauge metal, but I could not. This one is just like the flimsy one that came with my fire dish and rotted/burned within two years. Why is this thing so expensive? The screen arrived quickly and it was pretty much what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From start to finish this was a great experience. Customer service emailed us to confirm all ...
customer_reviews.text: From start to finish this was a great experience. Customer service emailed us to confirm all of the info and once they learned it was a gift for our father, they put the jacket into a nice gift box. Our father loves the jacket and cannot stop expressing how well made, elegant, stylish and comfortable it is. I highly recommend this company and product. Looking forward to getting one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking screen
customer_reviews.text: The screen is exactly as pictured. Looks nice and it arrived quickly too!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: The screen came in bent in two places. It must have happened during the handling. Too much money for this item, it is somewhat flimsy and the packaging didn’t help.
customer_reviews.author: JIHAD RIZKALLAH

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived in good condition
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and in good condition. It fits my square outdoor firepit well, but it's still too early to see how it will hold up, as it has barely been exposed to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: am1

customer_reviews.title: It is fine, and what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It is fine, and what I expected. I built a masonry fire pit a few years ago to fit a 24" square screen, which I have. I bought this screen simply to have a replacement when my current one eventually wears out. I was surprised how quickly it arrived. all and all a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but pricey
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for, great quality. Just a little bit pricey
customer_reviews.author: ogde

customer_reviews.title: Bent, but functional.
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews stated, the mesh was bent upon arrival. The main frame is fine. Still usable, just cosmetic. Just the right size at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S.

customer_reviews.title: Spark cover
customer_reviews.text: It works & that's the main thing. It got rusty right away but it does its job & it was inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: iris

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my fire pit. Added a touch of class
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Rusting in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: 2 months after purchase and rust is already forming. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Should be better
customer_reviews.text: One side was wrinkled, but it works fine. It did start to rust almost immediately. For the price, it should be better.
customer_reviews.author: Mina K Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Met all expectations, have used it several times and it does what it is supposed to do, very pleased
customer_reviews.author: judy m diorio

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks even better. Perfect for summer fire pit evenings.
customer_reviews.author: rickter

customer_reviews.title: Make sure measure your fire pit first.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my new fire pit great and looks good to thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult finding a large enough screen for our custom built fire pit. This works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: M. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and as advertised. Nothing more to be asked for.
customer_reviews.author: chris dalton

customer_reviews.title: Rusty
customer_reviews.text: This screen was as described - but after only being outside over our fire pit for a few weeks it is almost completely rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline McHugh

customer_reviews.title: ... screen is all bent and does not look very nice. For what I paid
customer_reviews.text: The screen is all bent and does not look very nice. For what I paid, I expected better quality. Should work well enough for this one summer.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Leibert

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: In print, the screen was just what I was looking for, however, when I got it the screen was bent, not square, and after the first rain storm my new stone fire pit had rust on the corners. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ryan

customer_reviews.title: DId not last...unfortunately.
customer_reviews.text: Rusted within 2 weeks and unfortunately got bent when a log was dropped on it. Such a shame!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Croteau

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came with a bent side, no response after a week after writing an email asking for a return/replacement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where there are sparks there are flames!
customer_reviews.text: the screen cover is the perfect size and is well made. It does give me peace of mind knowing the embers are covered when i go top bed at night after a long fire.
customer_reviews.author: lisa Berry Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit snd functionality.....but the shape collapsed and it rusted immediately...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item as described arrived on time and will the the finishing touch on my next project.
customer_reviews.author: George Heffington

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the screen came down from the rodes that hold it up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Original Screen Replacement
customer_reviews.text: This product replaced my original fire pit spark screen and actually provides more space for firewood than the original.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Rusted in days!
customer_reviews.text: Rusted within a week. Good size. Serves its purpose. Wish it wasn't so expensive since the quality isn't great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the fire screen. It's just the right size and looks durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie McNair

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Came within time frame noted but boxing was not protective enough...some bent screen but overall satisfied with item
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: it came quickly and the quality was very good. I couldn't have asked for more
customer_reviews.text: Simply, I ordered the screen, it came quickly and the quality was very good. I couldn't have asked for more.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stoloff

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the item shipped quickly and seems to work as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Part Missing Screen is nice
customer_reviews.text: Just got home from 2 week vacation and opened the box. The spark screen is great, but there was a part missing. The ring that screws to the center top is no where to be found. How can I get in touch with the company? There wasn't even an invoice in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Iannarone

product_meta.title: Sunnydaze Fire Pit Spark Screen Cover - Outdoor Heavy Duty Steel Square Firepit Lid Protector - Black Metal Mesh Fire Pit Replacement Accessory - 24 Inch
feature_bullets: GREAT FIRE PIT ACCESSORY: Firepit spark screen measures 24 inch square x 5 inches tall; Weighs 3.3 pounds; Makes a great addition to outdoor bonfire

WIRE MESH FOR BETTER FIRE: Fireplace screen is made from durable steel and steel mesh to ensure that it will last; Plus, the metal X-Shaped bands on top add extra strength and appeal; The steel also wraps around the bottom edges of the screens for even more stability and strength; Mesh allows for airflow, for an optimal fire

FEATURES RING ON TOP: No assembly required; Replacement spark screen features a metal easy-lift handle on top is for easily moving the spark cover on and off with ease; Ring on top is additonal safety feature, as you can safely lift the hot spark screen off the fire

SAFE SPARK GUARD: Spark protector will help keep the spark and embers in the fire pit and away from you and your loved ones safe; Firepit topper is stylish and functional addition to backyard fire pit
WORRY-FREE PURCHASING: Sunnydaze Decor backs its products with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty for worry-free purchasing

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars123 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
